Posts.EditableText:
Everything I click on an text adventure to play this error pops up...

Loading...

Error loading game:
There is not enough space on the disk.[Sorry, an error occurred]

It was working fine a few hours ago and now I can't play anything. I've restarted my computer, and refreshed the page several times, cleared out some of my computer RAM, Even scanned my computer for viruses and nothing seems to work. Has the site crashed or is this just some bug?
Posts.HTML:
Everything I click on an text adventure to play this error pops up...

Loading...

Error loading game:
There is not enough space on the disk.[Sorry, an error occurred]

It was working fine a few hours ago and now I can't play anything. I've restarted my computer, and refreshed the page several times, cleared out some of my computer RAM, Even scanned my computer for viruses and nothing seems to work. Has the site crashed or is this just some bug?

Posts.EditableText: It was a server problem - disk was full of temporary files. I've cleared these so the site is now working again!
Posts.HTML: It was a server problem - disk was full of temporary files. I've cleared these so the site is now working again!
